zh._service_00_: 您能从我这里获得什么 ？
zh._get_what_1_desc_: 以专业的技术和态度满足您的需求。
zh._get_what_2_desc_: 服务涵盖多个领域，满足多样化的客户需求。
zh._get_what_3_desc_: 满足您的所有需求，提供个性化解决方案。
zh._get_what_4_desc_: 高效地提供高质量的的作品。
zh._materials_desc_: 选择您心仪的图片资源，并为您提供个性定制服务，将每一份设计转化为富有创意与价值的艺术品。
zh._portrait_1_: 捕捉自然之美，定格每一个难忘瞬间。
zh._portrait_2_: 用镜头讲述您的故事，让每一帧都散发独特魅力。
zh._portrait_3_: 从精致构图到柔和光影，为您呈现高品质人像艺术。
zh._portrait_4_: 无论是日常拍摄还是特别时刻，助您展现最动人的一面。
zh._front_end_desc_1_: 提供全面前端定制，满足界面设计和交互需求。
zh._front_end_desc_2_: 支持新开发或优化现有界面，灵活应对项目需求。
zh._front_end_desc_3_: 可指定框架或工具，精准实现您的设想。
zh._front_end_desc_4_: 设计风格多样，确保与品牌形象完美契合。
zh._front_end_desc_5_: 提供技术咨询，助您选择合适的前端技术栈。
zh._basic_3_: 构建属于您的静态或伪动态网站
zh._additional_2_: 使用框架、库或扩展包，开发您的静态或伪动态网站。
zh._deploy_1_: 开发完成后，可以帮助您将网站部署到您喜爱的域名或任意静态网页托管平台上。
zh._fullstack_why_1_: 为您的项目匹配一个既优化性能又提升开发效率的技术栈。
zh._fullstack_why_2_: 确保您的系统在未来需求变化时依然保持灵活性。
zh._fullstack_why_3_: 提供从代码开发、测试到部署和上线的全流程技术支持。
zh._fullstack_why_4_: 合理利用资源，为您提供更具成本效益且高效的开发解决方案。

en._get_what_1_desc_: Ensures your needs are met with expertise and dedication.
en._get_what_2_desc_: The services cover multiple fields to meet the diverse needs of customers.
en._get_what_3_desc_: Meet your unique needs and provide personalized solutions.
en._materials_desc_: Choose your favorite image resources and get custom solutions tailored to your needs.
en._portrait_1_: Capture the essence of natural beauty and freeze every unforgettable moment.
en._portrait_2_: Tell your story through the lens, with every frame radiating unique charm.
en._portrait_3_: From exquisite compositions to soft lighting, we deliver high-quality portrait artistry.
en._portrait_4_: Be it everyday shoots or special moments, help you showcase your most captivating side.
en._front_end_desc_1_: Comprehensive front-end customization for design and interaction needs.
en._front_end_desc_2_: Support new development or existing interface optimization flexibly.
en._front_end_desc_3_: Specify frameworks or tools, and we'll implement your vision precisely.
en._front_end_desc_4_: Diverse styles to perfectly match your brand identity.
en._front_end_desc_5_: Technical consultancy to help select the right front-end tech stack.
en._additional_2_: Develop Static or Pseudo-dynamic Websites Using Frameworks, Libraries, or Extension Packages.
en._deploy_1_: Once development is complete, assist in deploying your site to your preferred domain or any static web hosting platform.
en._fullstack_why_1_: Align your project with a technology stack that maximizes performance and ensures development efficiency.
en._fullstack_why_2_: Ensure your system stays adaptable to evolving future requirements.
en._fullstack_why_3_: Offer end-to-end technical support, from code development and testing to deployment and launch.
en._fullstack_why_4_: Efficiently utilize resources to deliver cost-effective and high-performing development solutions.
